pages.text: To bottle reaped essence, you need to target and $(4)right-click$() them with either essence keepers or essence vessels.$(br2)Essences possess different levels of quality which determine their bottled amount.

pages.title: Common Blood Essence
pages.text: Common blood essence is worth 1 blood and is a bright red color.$(br2)It spawns when basic mobs are reaped.

pages.title: Common Soul Essence
pages.text: Common soul essence is worth 1 soul and is a bright blue color.$(br2)It spawns when basic mobs are reaped. During the darkest nights, all common soul essence will become grieving soul essence.

pages.title: Grieving Soul Essence
pages.text: Grieving soul essence is worth 2 souls and is a dark blue color.$(br2)It spawns when mobs with 40 or more max health are reaped, it can also spawn when players are reaped.

pages.title: Culled Soul Essence
pages.text: Culled soul essence is worth 5 souls and is a bright green color.$(br2)It spawns when mobs with 100 or more max health are reaped, it can also spawn when bosses with less than 300 max health are reaped.

pages.title: Spectral Soul Essence
pages.text: Spectral soul essence is worth 20 souls and is a jet black color.$(br2)It spawns when special mobs are reaped and it is not often encountered.

pages.title: Wrathful Soul Essence
pages.text: Wrathful soul essence is worth 40 souls and is a nightmarish orange color.$(br2)It spawns when bosses with 300 or more max health are reaped.
